name: Aggressive DNA Strand
description: Aggressive DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's ATK is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's ATK.

name: Baton Pass
description: Whenever a Temtem with Baton Pass enters the battlefield, it regains 8% of its maximum HP.
gameDescription: When entering the battlefield, restores 8% of max HP.

name: Calm Patch
description: When the user of Calm Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain ATK TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning ATK TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile NEEDS DESC
gameDescription: When entering the battlefield, removes stage changes.

name: Clumsy Patch
description: When the user of Clumsy Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain SPATK TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning SPATK TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Coat
description: Coat grants -20% damage when hit by Wind Techniques.
gameDescription: Damage taken from Wind techniques is reduced by 20%.

name: Coward's Cloak
description: Coward's Cloak Allows the holding Temtem to gain experience and TV from Combat without taking part.
gameDescription: "Revolutionary cogno-cloak that allows the Temtem holding it to gain experience from battle without even taking part in it."

name: Decoy
description: Decoy Increases the chance of running away from untamed Temtem.
gameDescription: "Useful distraction if you want to run away."

name: Dominant DNA Strand
description: Dominant DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's SPDEF is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's SPDEF.

name: Doppelganger Brooch
description: When the Temtem holding Doppelganger Brooch deals damage to another Temtem of its evolutionary line, it is increased by 50%.
gameDescription: Damage done to Temtem in the same evolutionary line is increased by 50%.

name: DoubleScreen
description: Whenever the Temtem holding DoubleScreen takes damage from a Temtem with multiple types, it takes 10% less damage.
gameDescription: Damage taken from dual type Temtem is reduced by 10%.

name: Drill
description: When the user of Drill attacks a Temtem with the Evading Condition, it loses the condition before the attack. The technique does not fail.
gameDescription: Another dubious invention from Akihiro Labs. When attacking an evading target, removes the evading status condition and the technique will not fail.

name: Endurance DNA Strand
description: Endurance DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's STA is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's STA.

name: Energy Drink
description: Energy Drink Prevents the Asleep Status condition.
gameDescription: Prevents the Asleep Condition.

name: Engineered DNA Strand
description: Engineered DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's Trait is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's trait slot.

name: Eraser
description: When a Temtem with Eraser would gain TVs, instead, it loses half the amount it would have gained..
gameDescription: Instead of earning TVs from defeated Temtem, the Temtem loses half those TVs.

name: Fatigue Patch
description: When the user of Fatigue Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain HP TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning HP TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Fire Chip
description: Fire Chip grants +10% damage when using Fire Techniques.
gameDescription: Damage done by Fire Techniques is increased by 10%.

name: Four-Leaf Clover
description: Four-Leaf Clover is gear to be held by a Temtem. When held by an active member of your team in battle, it increases the catch-rate when capturing untamed Temtem.
gameDescription: Increases the catch percentage when facing wild Temtem.

name: Gifted DNA Strand
description: Gifted DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's SPATK is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's SPATK.

name: Grease
gameDescription: Prevents the Trapped Condition.

name: Hand Fan
description: Hand Fan +10% damage when using Wind Techniques.
gameDescription: Damage done by Wind Techniques is increased by 10%.

name: Handcuffs
description: When the user of Handcuffs gives a Temtem the Exhausted Condition, the target also gets the Trapped Condition for 3 turns.
gameDescription: A souvenir from Visesia... When exhausting a Temtem, the target gets trapped for 3 turns.

name: Hardening DNA Strand
description: Hardening DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's DEF is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: Hardening DNA Strand This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's DEF.

name: Hopeless Tonic
description: When the last Temtem alive has the Hopeless Tonic, once, it regains full HP, Stamina, loses all previous conditions, and then gains the Doomed Condition for 3 turns.
gameDescription: When there's nothing else to drink... Once per battle, if the Temtem is the last ally standing, restores full HP, STA, heals all previous Status Conditions, and gets Doomed for 3 turns.

name: Humble Patch
description: When the user of Humble Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain SPDEF TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning SPDEF TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Ice Cube
description: Ice Cube grants -20% damage when hit by Fire Techniques.
gameDescription: Damage taken from Fire Techniques is reduced by 20%.

name: Immunity DNA Strand
description: Immunity DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's DEF and SPDEF is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's DEF and SPDEF.

name: Iron Coating
description: Iron Coating increases the damage done by Earth Type techniques of its holder by 10%.
gameDescription: Damage done with Earth techniques is increased by 10%.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Lightning Rod grants -20% damage when hit by Electric Techniques.
gameDescription: Damage taken from Electric Techniques is reduced by 20%.

name: Lithe DNA Strand
description: Lithe DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's SPD is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's SPD.

name: Lure
description: Lure Untamed Temtem are forced to target the bearer.
gameDescription: Untamed Temtem can't ignore this delicious Lure and are forced to target the bearer. (Equipped Temtem will be the focus of all attacks in wild encounters)

name: Mighty DNA Strand
description: Mighty DNA Strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's ATK and SPATK
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's ATK and SPATK

name: Oblivion Patch
description: When the user of Oblivion Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain any TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Pansunscreen
description: Pansunscreen Prevents the Burned Status condition.
gameDescription: Prevents the Burned Status condition.

name: Pillow
description: Pillow Restores 10% max HP of an Asleep Temtem at turn start.
gameDescription: At the start of the turn, restores 10% of max hp of an Asleep Temtem.

name: Proteins
description: Proteins doubles the TV gain from defeating Temtem or capturing a wild one.
gameDescription: x2 TV bonus from defeated Temtem.

name: Resistance Badge
description: Resistance Badge grants +15% damage when attacking with Neutral Techniques.
gameDescription: "You have vowed to defend freedom in Kisiwa. Damage done with Neutral techniques is increased by 15%."

name: Rock Shield
description: Damage taken from Crystal Techniques is reduced by 20%
gameDescription: Damage taken from Crystal Techniques is reduced by 20%

name: Shuine's Horn
description: Shuine's Horn is a piece of gear.
gameDescription: Changes the Temtem's Toxic Type Techniques toWater Type.

name: Slingshot
description: Whenever the holder of Slingshot attacks an enemy target which results in x1/4 damage from type resistances, it gains +1DEF, +1SPDEF, and +1SPD.
gameDescription: When attacking with a super ineffective technique, gets +1DEF, +1SPDEF, and +1SPD.

name: Snare
gameDescription: When attacked, disables the attacker's gear.

name: Soft Patch
description: When the user of Soft Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain DEF TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning DEF TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Squeezer
gameDescription: Healing medicine items used in battle restore an additional 70% HP

name: Stiff Patch
description: When the user of Stiff Patch defeats a Temtem, it will not gain SPD TVs.
gameDescription: Prevents earning SPD TVs from defeated Temtem.

name: Strange Vest
description: When the user of Strange Vest is attacked, if it is a Physical attack, the user will apply their SPDEF instead of DEF. Similarly, if it is a Special attack, the user will apply their DEF instead of SPDEF.
gameDescription: When attacked with a Physical technique, uses the SPDEF, and when attacked with a Special technique, uses the DEF.

name: Sweatband
gameDescription: At the start of the turn restores 15% of max STA

name: Talisman
description: Talisman Prevents the Doomed Status condition.
gameDescription: "Prevents the Doomed Status condition."

name: Tucma Mask
gameDescription: Damage taken from Toxic Techniques is reduced by 20%

name: Turban
description: Turban reduces damage from Earth Techniques by 20% when user is attacked.
gameDescription: A memento from your acting days... Damage taken from Earth techniques is reduced by 20%.

name: Umbrella
description: Umbrella grants -20% damage when hit by Water Techniques.
gameDescription: "Damage taken from Water Techniques is reduced by 20%"

name: Vigor DNA Strand
description: Vigor DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's HP and STA is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's HP and STA.

name: Vitality DNA Strand
description: Vitality DNA Strand is a single-use held item used in Breeding. When held, it ensures the holder's HP is inherited by the egg. It is only sold in the Breeding Center in Omninesia.
gameDescription: Vitality DNA Strand This single-use DNA strand ensures the egg inherits the parent's HP.

name: War Drum
description: When the user of War Drum or its ally uses a Physical attack, its damage is increased by 8%.
gameDescription: "The Kisiwan call to arms. Allies' damage done with Physical techniques is increased by 8%."
